price: Kuma idan an ce masa: "Ka ji tsõron Allah," sai girman kai da yin zunubi ya ɗauke shi To abin da yake mai isarsa Jahannama ce. Kuma haƙĩƙa, shimfiɗa tã munana.
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُ ٱتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ أَخَذَتۡهُ ٱلۡعِزَّةُ بِٱلۡإِثۡمِۚ فَحَسۡبُهُۥ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَلَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمِهَادُ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā qīla lahu ittaqi al-laha akhadhathu al-ʿizatu bil-ith'mi faḥasbuhu jahannamu walabi'sa al-mihādu
